getStart.title: Make project simple and Efficient with
getStart.description: Prime Project Manager is a project management software that helps you plan, track, and manage your projects effectively. It is a simple and easy-to-use tool that helps you manage your projects efficiently.

feature.title: One Product,
feature.subtitle: Many Solutions
feature.description: Our platform is designed to help you build and scale your business with ease.
feature.scrumDescription: Framework that helps teams organize tasks, assign them to team members, and efficiently track task progress within well-defined work cycles.
feature.waterfallDescription: Project development model that emphasizes a clear sequence of steps, starting from requirement gathering, design, development, and testing.
feature.kanbanDescription: Tool that provides an overview of tasks in the form of boards, helping to flexibly manage and track task progress across different stages of the workflow.
feature.memberDescription: System for managing project team members, allowing roles to be assigned and permissions to be defined, ensuring smooth and efficient collaboration.
feature.resourceDescription: Centralized space for collecting all project-related documents, making storage and access convenient while aligning with project requirements.
feature.notifyDescription: System that alerts team members about important project updates, including notifications for assigned tasks or issues, via both in-system alerts and emails.

team.title: Developers Team
team.description: We take pride in our diverse and dedicated development team. Every member plays a crucial role in the creation and success of the Prime Project Manager. Get to know the team members who are ready to work hard and are committed to bringing your project to success.

footer.university: King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang
footer.locate: 1 Chalong Krung 1 Alley, Lat Krabang, Khet Lat Krabang, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10520, Thailand

subtitle.dashboard: Display an overview, track progress, and summarize essential project information.
subtitle.sprint: Manage sprints, track progress, and summarize sprint information.
subtitle.backlog: Manage tasks and quickly add them to sprints.
subtitle.gantt: Manage tasks in Gantt chart format.
subtitle.board: Manage tasks in Kanban board format.
subtitle.task: Manage tasks, assign tasks to team members, and track task progress.
subtitle.resource: Manage project documents and conveniently access relevant files.

scrum.title: Scrum
scrum.description: Scrum is suitable for projects that are complex or have frequently changing requirements, emphasizing flexibility and collaboration to accommodate adjustments during project execution.

waterfall.title: Waterfall
waterfall.description: Waterfall is suitable for projects with clearly defined timelines and scopes, following a structured sequence of steps with minimal changes to requirements.

kanban.title: Kanban
kanban.description: Kanban is suitable for projects requiring continuous workflow management or those with a steady influx of tasks, focusing on prioritization and efficient task flow.

feedback.description: Enter your feedback or problems you encounter. Our team will address them as soon as possible.
